original_text: When Paul came in, the Jews who had come down from Jerusalem stood around him. They brought many serious charges against him, but they could not prove them.
korean_text: 그가 나오매 예루살렘에서 내려온 유대인들이 둘러서서 여러 가지 중대한 사건으로 고발하되 능히 증거를 대지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: Jews who had come down from Jerusalem
They brought many serious charges against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에 대한 많은 심각한 혐의를 제기했다

sentences.original_text: but they could not prove them
